title: World Home Security Solutions Market to Post 8.8% CAGR Through 2022, States Stratistics MRC in Its Report Available at MarketPublishers.com
text:
The world market for home security solutions is expected to expand from USD 29.4 billion as of 2014 to be estimated at USD 57.73 billion by 2022, recording 8.8% CAGR. The residential security segment is anticipated to lead the overall market, registering robust growth in the offing. The growth in the overall home security solutions sector is being propelled by a notable hike in crime rates, mobile devices for remote monitoring, and surging consumer awareness. However, the market growth is being restrained by the dearth of awareness and increased installation costs. The fierce competition resulting in technological developments amid the electrical distributors and telecommunications service providers are opening up bright opportunities for the growth in the market. North America accounts for the lion’s share of the market for home security solutions, and it is set to maintain its leadership position until the end of the forecasted period. Europe and APAC are also deemed as promising markets over the forecasted period. UTC Fire & Security, Godrej & Boyce Manufacturing Company Limited, Tyco, Alarm.com, Control4 Corporation, Nortek Security & Control LLC, ASSA ABLOY, Control4 Corporation and Allegion PLC are amid the leading companies active in the home security solutions market space on a global level. Comprehensive research study “ Global Home Security Solutions Market Outlook (2014-2022) ” developed by Stratistics Market Research Consulting (Stratistics MRC) is now available at MarketPublishers.com.
